## Responzivnost

Upravit menu webu pro rozli코en칤 na mobiln칤ch telefonech

### Responzivn칤 web

- nastaven칤 `viewport` <https://www.w3schools.com/css/css_rwd_viewport.asp>
- pou쬴t칤 prom캩nliv칳ch `width` oproti pevn칳m
- media queries - r콢zn칠 styly pro r콢zn치 rozli코en칤
- `rem` m칤sto `px`
- metoda `mobile first`


```css
.big {
    font-size: 3rem;
    font-weight: bold;
}
```

```html
<div id="widescreen" class="big">widescreen</div>
<div id="normal" class="big">normal</div>
<div id="tablet" class="big">tablet</div>
<div id="smartphone" class="big">smartphone</div>
<div id="landscape" class="big">landscape</div>
```

```css
body {
    background-color: grey;
    color: white;
    text-align: center;
    padding-top: 100px;
}

.big { /* dopln칤me */
    display: none;
    text-transform: capitalize;
}
```

```css
@media(max-width:500px) {
    body {
        background-color: red;
    }

    #smartphone {
        display: block;
    }
}
```

```css
@media(min-width: 501px) and (max-width:768px) {
    body {
        background-color: green;
    }

    #tablet {
        display: block;
    }
}
```

```css
@media(min-width: 769px) and (max-width:1200px) {
    body {
        background-color: cyan;
    }

    #normal {
        display: block;
    }
}
```


```css
@media(min-width: 1201px) {
    body {
        background-color: black;
    }

    #widescreen {
        display: block;
    }
}
```


```css
@media(max-height: 500px) {
    body {
        background-color: orange;
    }

    #landscape {
        display: block;
    }
}
```
